com.intel.fightclub.ui.utils

Class AnimationUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.fightclub.ui.utils.AnimationUtil

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class AnimationUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to handle simple animations.

                                                 android.view.View view,
                                                 int startColor,
                                                 int finalColor,
                                                 int animationDurationMillis)
        Changes the background color of a view with a smooth animation.
        Parameters:
        view - View to change background.
        startColor - View's initial background color.
        finalColor - View's final background color.
        animationDurationMillis - Duration of the animation in milliseconds.
